<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">cda015e3979c7110a195bbe3a253af58</macroponent><name>resizable_panes_container/defaultDisplayedPane</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {any} params.imports
  */
function evaluateProperty({api}) {
  const viewports = api.viewports;
  
  if (!viewports || !viewports.isRouteInitializationCompleted)
    return 'both';
  
  // hide the right side panel if there are no active routes.
  return viewports.contextual_sidebar.hasRoutes ? 'both' : 'left';
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-02 21:23:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>a9a015e3979c7110a195bbe3a253afdf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>resizable_panes_container/defaultDisplayedPane</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a9a015e3979c7110a195bbe3a253afdf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-02 21:23:19</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
